PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-15502009-09-09,  ,  ,  ,  INDUSTRY
ActPublic Service Labour Relations Act
SubjectNRC- Administrative Support** COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT **
PrecisOrder authorizing the NATIONAL RESEARCH COUNCIL CANADA to conclude a COLLECTIVE AGREEMENT with the RESEARCH COUNCIL EMPLOYEES' ASSOCIATION covering all the employees in the Administrative Support Bargaining Unit, which agreement expires on April 30, 2011.
AttachmentsAttachment
